failed_criteria: Promotional posters may be multiple if evenly spaced (min 2 inches apart) and secured flat with consistent alignment.
Posters should not overlap or obscure each other; all key information must be fully visible.
action_plan: Re-space poster frames to ensure a minimum of 2 inches gap between each poster.

visual_feedback: Gap between the two Borrow Online posters appears to be less than the required 2 inches.
Bottom portion of the right Borrow Online poster is obscured by the printer.

failed_criteria: Promotional posters (window or wall) may be multiple if evenly spaced (min 2 inches apart) and secured flat with consistent alignment.
action_plan: Re-space promotional posters ensuring at least 2 inches between each frame and verify consistent alignment before retaking the photo.
visual_feedback: The two 'Borrow Online 24/7' posters mounted side by side near the printer are placed with virtually no gap between frames, violating the minimum 2-inch spacing requirement.

failed_criteria: Promotional posters are not spaced at least 2 inches apart
action_plan: Reposition multiple promotional posters so that there is a minimum of 2 inches gap between each poster.
visual_feedback: The two circular promotional posters on the front window are touching at the edges with no visible gap, violating spacing requirement.

failed_criteria: No posters are torn, wrinkled, or damaged.
action_plan: Replace wrinkled or damaged posters ensuring all posters are flat and free of wrinkles or tears.
visual_feedback: Wrinkling observed on the yellow 'Cost per $100 Borrowed' poster's top-right corner in interior photo with timestamp 2025/05/29 14:15:05.

action_plan: Remove any personal postings such as the holiday notice on the front door; ensure only approved promotional materials are displayed.
visual_feedback: The Victoria Day holiday notice affixed to the front door window constitutes a personal posting and is visible in the lower center of the window.

failed_criteria: Posters should not overlap or obscure each other; all key information must be fully visible.
action_plan: Move or remove objects blocking posters (e.g., relocate printer) to ensure all key information on posters is fully visible.
visual_feedback: Bottom of the left 'Borrow Online 24/7' wall poster is partially obscured by the printer.
